item.title: #5Things：华尔街关注下一个通胀数据。TikTok 在美国的命运仍不明朗。中国承诺由中央政府出资鼓励企业更换老旧设备和商品。市场动向
item.description:

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-佩特洛（Gustavo Petro）试图通过新董事对哥伦比亚国有石油公司进行全面改革，以摆脱化石燃料的依赖，哥伦比亚国有石油公司的董事会成员对此表示反对。
item.description:
Board members of Colombia’s state oil company are objecting to President Gustavo Petro’s attempt to overhaul it with new directors as he works to wean the country off fossil fuels https://t.co/6hnfNy8XGv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 巴西最大的零售商 GPA 通过出售股票筹集了 7.04 亿雷亚尔（1.416 亿美元），作为削减债务负担计划的一部分。

item.title: 据一位熟悉情况的人士透露，Reddit 在首次公开募股时告诉潜在投资者，预计 2024 年的营收将比上年增长 20% 以上。
item.description:
Reddit is telling potential investors in its initial public offering that it expects revenue in 2024 to grow by more than 20% versus the previous year, according to a person familiar with the situation https://t.co/DzJnjHT626

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国钢铁工人联合会和新日本制铁公司正在为可能顺利收购美国钢铁公司的交易确定谈判立场

item.title: 悉尼市民抗议增加住房密度的计划。阅读 @georgiemckay4 撰写的今日澳大利亚简报，了解彭博社在澳大利亚和世界各地的每日精彩内容。

item.title: 美国众议院通过了一项禁止 TikTok 的法案，除非 ByteDance 出售该视频共享应用程序。参议院可能没有那么热情
item.description:
The US House passed a bill to ban TikTok unless ByteDance sells the video-sharing app. The Senate may not be as enthusiastic https://t.co/GWcLnAdV6Y

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在阿根廷争取到足够多的债券持有人将一系列 2024 年到期的本币债券换成期限更长的证券后，该国的地方债务信用评级被下调。
item.description:
Argentina’s local debt had its credit rating downgraded after the country secured enough bondholders to swap a slew of local currency bonds due in 2024 for longer dated securities. https://t.co/o9qjV8V5Qi

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 这位 57 岁的对冲基金经理利用自己的科学知识，开发出一套交易巨灾债券的制胜法宝--由于气候变化和通货膨胀，巨灾债券市场正在蓬勃发展。阅读《大手笔》 ⬇️
item.description:
This 57-year-old hedge fund manager used his scientific knowledge to develop a winning formula for trading catastrophe bonds — a market that’s booming thanks to climate change and inflation.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ https://t.co/qE3N4mfAW7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: Loro Piana 用于制作价值 9000 美元毛衣的羊毛来自安第斯山脉。采集这种奢华羊毛的原住民几乎一无所有。
item.description:
The wool Loro Piana uses to make its $9,000 sweaters comes from the Andes. The Indigenous people who collect the luxurious material have almost nothing to show for it. https://t.co/QIHtNeVRQE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: Altria 计划出售其在 Anheuser-Busch InBev 的部分股份，以支付自己的股票回购费用。
item.description:
Altria plans to sell a portion of its stake in Anheuser-Busch InBev to pay for its own share repurchases. https://t.co/c3fNM2Dr4Z

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）认为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能重返加拿大，在此之前，加拿大正在重启一个官方论坛，以理顺与美国每天 34 亿加元（约合 25 亿美元）的贸易关系。
item.description:
Canada is rebooting an official forum to smooth its C$3.4-billion-a-day ($2.5 billion) trading relationship with the US ahead of the “unpredictability” Prime Minister Justin Trudeau sees with a potential return of Donald Trump. https://t.co/aWsTiprNco

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 高盛混合资本美洲联席主管李-贝克尔（Lee Becker）是该行资产和财富管理部门离职人员中的一员
item.description:
Goldman's hybrid capital Americas co-head Lee Becker adds to the departures from the bank's asset- and wealth-management arm https://t.co/6AhRac2aiX

item.title: 乔-拜登（Joe Biden）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在获得各自党派的提名后，将展开近期记忆中最漫长、最丑陋的政治角逐。
item.description:
Having clinched their respective parties’ nominations, Joe Biden and Donald Trump are embarking on what is poised to be the longest — and one of the ugliest — political contests in recent memory https://t.co/sjqaEsxfgK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，市场利率 "不太可能 "恢复到 19 世纪科维德大流行引发通胀浪潮和收益率上升之前的水平。
item.description:
US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said it’s “unlikely” that market interest rates will return to levels that prevailed before the Covid-19 pandemic triggered a wave of inflation and higher yields. https://t.co/RblTpiW1gk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 由于供应过剩有减弱的迹象，针对 Albemarle 和 Pilbara Minerals 等全球最大锂生产商的价值数十亿美元的空头押注正受到威胁。
item.description:
Short bets worth billions against some of the world’s largest lithium producers like Albemarle and Pilbara Minerals are under threat as a supply glut shows signs of thinning https://t.co/t4K4wqBa6h

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会可以继续提起诉讼，指控双子座和破产的加密货币贷款机构 Genesis 通过其支付利息的双子座盈产品非法发售未经注册的证券。
item.description:
The SEC can proceed with its suit accusing Gemini and bankrupt cryptocurrency lender Genesis of illegally offering unregistered securities through their interest-paying Gemini Earn product. https://t.co/MfORejcKjm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 数字资产市场上的memecoin狂潮没有停止的迹象，目前的交易量达到了两年多前上一次加密货币泡沫破灭前的水平。
item.description:
The memecoin frenzy in the digital-asset market shows no signs of stopping, with trading volumes now at levels last seen just before the burst of the last crypto bubble more than two years ago https://t.co/LRTGGMrBZA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024

item.title: 康明斯公司（Cummins Inc.）计划在首次公开募股（IPO）中分拆出 Atmus 过滤技术公司约一年后分配其剩余股权，这为交易商蜂拥参与 15 亿美元的交换要约敞开了大门。
item.description:
Cummins Inc. plans to distribute its remaining stakes in Atmus Filtration Technologies about a year after carving out the unit in an IPO, opening the door for traders to swarm the $1.5 billion exchange offer. https://t.co/oLIj5n7IBS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 13, 2024
